data.name: Maid Cafe
data.detailed_description:
Deluxe DLC Bundle

This game was developed using Kickstarter to fund its creation, thanks to an amazing amount of people we not only were able to create this amazing game, but also an array of DLC, each of which adds brand new content to the game in the form of extended adult scenes, new adult scenes, epilogues, more romance, more love scenes and lots of supernatural fun. Plus Adult Comic Stories featuring the characters from the game.


Make sure you pickup the DLC bundle available now so you can enjoy every scrap of content available for the Maid Cafe game and enjoy the experience and the hundreds of secret events and storylines available to play.


About the Game

Maid Café is a visual novel story, where you take on the role of Michael, a young man who recently lost a fancy job in the city and has had to return home as his savings ran out. Finding himself homeless, living on a friends sofa and unemployed was hardly his plan for when he reached 23 but it is time to pick himself up again and find a job.

This story follows the protagonist, who you control, as he begins working at a local cafe as their pastry chef, but it is not a simple thing, because the cafe is a Maid Cafe and it seems almost everyone who works there is someone you were previously acquainted with... Intimately. Making the work experience all that more complicated as each of these women and many more you meet along the way seem to desire to be more than just friends and co-workers.

Included in the game are over 30 different female characters to interact with ranging from your co-workers to new friends you meet around town, many of whom have sexy events to unlock and enjoy. **Don't forget to checkout our Adult DLC which adds extra adult scenes to the game!**

To make things all that more complicated you seem to have also caught the eye of a Succubus Demon named Envy who seems to delight in having fun with you, not just sexual fun but also crazy magical shenanigans making things all the more complex as the game progresses.

In addition to a huge story that spans a two month period within the world, players also get to enjoy the following:
  • Learning Dessert Recipes and Crafting Them.
  • Upgrading your Recipes to make them better.
  • Earn Tips and wages to spend in shops and on dates.
  • Buy gifts and speciality items to unlock secret events.
  • Freedom to do as you wish when not working at the Cafe.
  • Date multiple women from the world.
  • Engage in a Bake-off Competition to determine the best patisserie
  • Encounter a variety of supernatural creatures.
  • Find various collectibles throughout the game.
  • Unlock animated sexy sequences.
...And even more in this huge visual novel game.

data.short_description: You are the protagonist as he begins working at a maid cafe, but it is not a simple thing as almost everyone who works there is someone you were previously acquainted with... Intimately. Plus with lots of beautiful women in town and a Succubus Demon to contend with, things get tricky real fast!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP or Newer
  • Processor: 1.66 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.50 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X version Leopard 10.6 or later
  • Processor: 1.66 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS X version Leopard 10.6 or later
  • Processor: 2.50 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:

  • Processor: 1.66 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:

  • Processor: 2.50 Ghz

  • Graphics: 1920x1080
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes:
Maid Cafe features suggestive scenes, revealing clothing and lingerie, nudity and sexually explicit scenes as various women have intimate sexual encounters with the male protagonist.

All characters included in the game are at least 18 years of age or older.

DLC is available to augment the game with even more adult content.
